No, Steve Harvey is ignorant. Because of his unpreparedness and stupidity he did not read the correct name as winner!!!!! This was a tragedy to both Miss Phillipines and Miss Columbia. Moreover, Steve Harvey and a judge there made some rude attacks on Trump. That showed what a pack of liberal progressive dirt bags they and their management were. They completely ruined the pageant for people watching all over the world...Also, Steve Harvey appeared to be making too many comments about wanting to see their swimsuit competition again, and making stupid faces as well about what he was thinking about them in swimsuits. In the USA workplace, he could have gotten fired for that behavior nowadays. He was totally unprepared for his host role and embarassed the USA in the process.

Catlan, a buck IS different than a lion. Here, deer become overpopulated. There, they need protection. What you're doing is justification of sport killing. There is nothing honorable or right about killing for sport. It is sick, and the sign of a severe disorder.

What she CLAIMS to eat, and what she ACTUALLY eats, may very well be two quite different things. I know people who do this. So you're claiming that her body has discovered a way to circumvent the first law of thermodynamics? Call Stockholm, get this chick the Nobel! Even IF she's eating """"all healthy"""" food, then she's just eating too much of it. If 1700 calories keeps you overweight, you're going to have to knock it down to 1600. There's science involved here, but it ain't rocket.
